help.name: Support Group Administration
help.description: This action is an ITSM utility, designed to create or update support groups and to manage their members and related details.

option.description: Describes the Velocity condition to allow the execution of action's operation. The evaluation is performed before action operation and contains a context with all input parameters and read attributes for the particular CoreItem instance processed by the requested operation
Current support group company. In addition the action supports another alias for this option: supportgroupcompany
Current support group organisation. In addition the action supports another alias for this option: supportgrouporganisation
Current support group name. In addition the action supports some aliases for this option: sgroup, supportgroup, supportgroupname
Current support group id. In addition the action supports some aliases for this options: supportgroupid
